reference.title: Formatting controls
reference.shortdesc: A summary of the formatting that can be controlled with spdf4_basic-settings.xsl.

section.p: These are the formatting controls that can be set from the spdf4_basic-settings.xsl file.

ul.li: Last page behavior (blank or with headers and footers)
Default font size and leading (default, secondary (<lq> for example), monospace, and trademarks)
Three levels of cover page title fonts, plus author

li.p: Display order of copyright and trademark information. Includes:

ul.li: Header and footer fonts and position
Table of contents fonts for part, chapter and appendix, level 1 and level 2 heads
Part header styles including font and rule specification
Chapter and appendix header styles including font and rule specification
Separate controls for chapter number, the word "Chapter", and the actual chapter title
Font and vertical spacing controls for six levels of heads
Optional chapter information in figure and table titles
Figure space before and after, title style and position
Example space before and after, title style and position

Index controls, including:
Number of columns
Column gap
Incremental indent
Letter group fonts
Index entry fonts
Index link fonts

section.p:
For all font specifications, you can set:
family
size
space above (leading)
color
style (italic or not)
weight
